properties.address: CVC Hub, 2-4 Clyde Walk, The Centre, Cumbernauld, North Lanarkshire G67 1DA
properties.description: There will be a small area with toys for small children, but children need to be supervised at all times. Our focus is for those who find themselves needing company, warmth or a safe space, but everyone is very welcome. We are opening from 10-2 each Monday with space to make toast and have a cup of tea or coffee. We have a mix of cafe style tables and sofas & you are welcome to have some peace and quiet or find someone to chat to. Everyone is very welcome.
properties.title: Cumbernauld Vineyard Church
